name: Circle Pong Showdown
description:
Circle Pong Showdown

Controls -
Player 1 "left arrow key" and "right arrow key" to move
Player 2 "A" and "D" keys to move
"Escape key" to pause the game
Instructions -
Objective is to score the ball in your opponents goal. First to 5 wins.

CGDD project 1 by Úlfur Ingólfsson
all assets and sounds created by me
